Uniform Law:

This section is based on ยง 403 of the Uniform Limited Cooperative Association Act . See Vol. 6A , Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition or ULA Database on Westlaw.

DC CODE ยง 29-1004.03

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: A substantive change to a proposed amendment of the organic rules shall not be made at the members meeting at which a vote on the amendment occurs.

A nonsubstantive change to a proposed amendment of the organic rules may be made at the members meeting at which the vote on the amendment occurs and need not be separately voted upon by the board of directors.
A vote to adopt a nonsubstantive change to a proposed amendment to the organic rules shall be by the same percentage of votes required to pass a proposed amendment.

subchapter.text: Amendment of Organic Rules of Limited Cooperative Association.

heading.catch_text: Method of voting on amendment of organic rules.
